lore: The most widespread of a forge world’s priesthood, Enginseers maintain many of the Imperium’s mechanisms, such as reactors, battle tanks and even starships. They have an intuitive connection with holy apparatuses, and can awaken the most recalcitrant of engine spirits with whispered machine cant.

otherAbilities.name: Enginseer
otherAbilities.description: While this model is within 3'' of one or more friendly AEPTUS MCHANICUS VHICLE units, unless it is leading a unit, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

otherAbilities.name: Omnissiah’s Blessing
otherAbilities.description: In your Command phase, select one friendly AEPTUS MCHANICUS model within 3'' of this model. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds and, if it is a VHICLE model, until the start of your next Command phase, that model has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per Command phase.

otherAbilities.name: Vengeance for the Omnissiah
otherAbilities.description: If a friendly AEPTUS MCHANICUS VHICLE model is destroyed within 12'' of this model, until the end of the battle, this model’s Omnissian axe has an Attacks characteristic of 6
